name: Permafrost "0"
description:
[INTERACTIVE]
Feel the cold. 
.
Allow your camera and show your hand a few seconds to interact.
..
Control the frostbite with your hand which will be detected with your camera.
...
Move your hand horizontally to change the direction of ice, vertically to change the intensity of the frostbite.
(LEFT OF THE SCREEN FOR DEEP FREEZE)
....
A machine learning model is used for detection.
.....
Made with p5js & mediapipe.
......
Artist: Kerem Altaylar
